column4: is it possible to change the location of the notification window in Jaunty?
well,there is a tool to change it,but it doesnt change it though
install notify-osd and try
that package is the window if im not mistaken
ya type that in terminal and check?
no command
i vaguely recollect using it once,but notification didnt change
i believe its not istalled
you need to install it,or maybe i forget the package name
yes it is.. but to humor you, ill try to install it
notify-osd is already the newest version.
well,hmm that should work in terminal then
its interesting because I remember seeing the tool in Preferences when I first installed Jaunty
yeah,now its not in preferences?
not since the 2nd time I had to reinstall
what do you mean by scan?
try install notification daemon maybe
its going to conflict with notify-osd which is also a daemon..
try kismet if you want to scan for wireless networks
well,actually i think we cant change it
wireless? i didnt ask about that .Some other user maybe
whoops
